label: Business network
description: Collaborated on the development of platform bn.by
Enhanced the platform's search functionality by implementing advanced filtering options, improving the user experience and increasing the efficiency of search queries
Developed and integrated a user-friendly notification system to keep users informed of important updates, events, and news within the platform
Assisted in optimizing the website's performance and loading speed by employing best practices in web development, ensuring a smooth browsing experience across all devices
Spearheaded the implementation of a responsive, mobile-first design, allowing users to access the platform with ease from various devices and screen sizes
Worked closely with the design and backend development teams to ensure seamless coordination and timely completion of tasks, leading to the successful launch of several new features and improvements
